name: Bantha Herd (V)
Lore: 'While banthas are found on many worlds, the largest herds are found on Tatooine. The Sand People of that planet learned to tame the beasts.',
Text: 'Deploy on a Tatooine site. Once per turn, may place up to 3 cards from hand face down here. You may ''react'' to battles initiated against your lone Tusken Raider by deploying (for free) any Tusken Raider(s) and/or Bantha(s) here. (Immune to Alter.)',
